subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|水|曼|alt1=氵|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – Water overflowing. Note that {{zh-l|曼}} means “vast, extended”, so connotations of “too much water, overflow”.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=màn
|c=maan4,maan6
|mn=bān/xm,zz:boān
|mn-t=bhuêng6/bhuang6/muang6
|mn-t_note=bhuêng6 - Chaozhou; bhuang6 - Shantou, Chenghai; muang6 - Chaoyang, Jieyang, Raoping
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=a,v
}}
